name: Stock Movement Report
query:
select pm.item_name,pm.bulan,pm.warehouse,sum(pm.produksi_masuk) as produksi_masuk from (
    select sed.item_name,sed.qty as "produksi_masuk",sed.t_warehouse as "warehouse",concat(month(se.posting_date),'-',year(se.posting_date)) 
	as "bulan" from `tabStock Entry Detail` sed inner join `tabStock Entry` se on sed.parent = se.name where 
	((sed.t_warehouse = 'Finish Good Before BIN - ISS') or (substring(sed.t_warehouse,1,3) = '901')) and se.purpose='Manufacture') pm group by pm.item_name,
    pm.bulan,pm.warehouse
